Uses of Class
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.event.Event

Packages that use Event
Package
Description
com.scarcolo.eventour.functions
Provides all support function
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.event
it provides the models on which the various classes are based to communicate with the database and to provide the answers by formatting them, regarding the events
com.scarcolo.eventour.repository.event
provides "unconventional" requests and responses for events regarding the repository
com.scarcolo.eventour.service.booking
Provides the services of the application, that is, the links and the logic that processes the requests and returns the responses by formatting them, regarding the bookings.
